name: Ctrl Alt Defeat (Jaden Romilio)
description:
Ctrl Alt Defeat

In Ctrl Alt Defeat player's take the role of a disgruntled unemployed martial arts expert and ex-security guard of a magnet factory who is set on battling his way through the multitude of self defense robots between him and his old boss.

What is Ctrl Alt Defeat

Ctrl Alt Defeat is a 3D turn-based and grid-based game in which the player uses the stances of Karate, Judo and Taekwondo to reach the end of each level.

Key Features

  • Strategize the best way to complete levels
  • Use enemies attacks against themselves
  • Use the environment to find the fastest route through the level 
  • Get the lowest score through completing levels with the fewest amount of turns made
  • Unlock and play through 20 unique levels
  • Create your own levels with .txt files
  • Make enemies attack other enemies
  • Use conveyor belts to navigate and set up your plans 
  • Use boxes to aid yourself or ruin your perfect plans

Created By:

Dion Bird

Nathan Poulton

Jaden Romilio

Tristan Riedel
